title: Astonishing X-Men: Gambit, Vol. 1 - House of Cards
description: Ever wonder what Gambit gets up to when he's not out saving the world with the X-Men? Welcome to the exciting but treacherous terrain of the New Orleans underworld, where Gambit's skills and mastery are unquestioned but this time, his confidence might be his downfall!Collects Gambit (2004) #1-6.
author: John Layman
